tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE board_meeting_minutes (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE NOT NULL,
  meeting_time TIME NOT NULL,
  attendees TEXT[] NOT NULL,
  agenda TEXT NOT NULL,
  minutes TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE board_meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_location VARCHAR(255),
    agenda_items TEXT,
    meeting_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
    attendee_role VARCHAR(255),
    is_present BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    attendee_name TEXT,
    role TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES board_meeting_minutes(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    document_name TEXT,
    document_type TEXT,
    document_path TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES board_meeting_minutes(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MeetingMinutes (
    minute_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    member_id INT,
    minute_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES MeetingAgendas(agenda_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES BoardMembers(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MeetingAttendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    member_id INT,
    attendance_status VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES MeetingAgendas(agenda_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES BoardMembers(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MeetingAttachments (
    attachment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    attachment_name VARCHAR(255),
    attachment_link VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES MeetingAgendas(agenda_id)
);
